abstract: Nielsen is set to announce that it is working with Facebook to include conversations on social network about television in its measurement system; company's new metric will also include activity on Twitter related to television.

headline.print_headline: Nielsen Using Facebook and Twitter for Ratings
headline.main: Nielsen to Use Facebook and Twitter in New Ratings System

snippet: The media research company will include Facebook conversations about TV shows, along with Twitter messages, in its measurement system.
lead_paragraph: The media research company will include Facebook conversations about TV shows, along with Twitter messages, in its measurement system.
